mapper.select: SELECT IDX ,AUTH_IDX ,USER_ID ,USER_PW ,USER_NAME ,USER_PHONE ,USER_ADDR ,USER_GRADE ,USER_REG_DATE ,USER_EMAIL ,USER_BIRTH FROM CODE_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}

SELECT aai.IDX ,cu.USER_ID -- 판매자ID ,aai.ADOPT_TYPE -- 분양종류 ,aai.ADOPT_IDX -- 분양 정보 인덱스 ,aai.USER_IDX -- 글등록 IDX ,aai.ACTIVITY_TYPE -- 분양활동 ( 거래중, 거래대기, 거래완료) ,aai.INSERTED_DATE -- 등록일 ,ai.ADOPT_TITLE -- 제목 FROM ADOPT_ACTIVITY_INFO aai INNER JOIN ADOPT_INFO ai ON aai.ADOPT_IDX = ai.IDX INNER JOIN CODE_USER cu ON aai.USER_IDX = cu.IDX WHERE USER_IDX = #{USER_IDX} AND aai.ADOPT_TYPE = 1;
